trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for all <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextWriter" name="TextWriter" href=""></xref> objects used for rendering ASP.NET mobile controls.
trans-unit.target: Gir basisklasse for alle <xref uid="langword_csharp_TextWriter" name="TextWriter" href=""> </xref> objekter som brukes til gjengivelse mobile ASP.NET-kontroller.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: The MobileTextWriter class and its inherited classes provide services and helper methods for adapters to perform rendering.
trans-unit.target: Klassen MobileTextWriter og arvet klassene gir tjenester og hjelper metoder for kort til å utføre gjengivelse.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the specified class.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en ny forekomst av den angitte klassen.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om hvordan du utvikler mobile ASP.NET-applikasjoner, kan du se den [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) webområdet.

trans-unit.source: Adapters are usually constructed automatically by ASP.NET and must have a default constructor.
trans-unit.target: Kort er vanligvis automatisk dannes av ASP.NET, og må ha en standardkonstruktør.

trans-unit.source: The base writer object.
trans-unit.target: Grunnleggende writer-objektet.

trans-unit.source: An object of <xref href="System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities"></xref> class that provides the capability information for the specific device.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt av <xref href="System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities"> </xref> klasse som gir mulighet informasjonen for enheten.

trans-unit.source: Adds a resource reference to the given URL, with the optional MIME type for the specified content.
trans-unit.target: Legger til en ressursreferanse til den angitte URL-adressen, med valgfri MIME-type for det angitte innholdet.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.

trans-unit.source: The URL to add the resource reference to.
trans-unit.target: URL-adressen til Legg til ressursreferanse.

trans-unit.source: (Optional) The MIME type of the content.
trans-unit.target: (Valgfritt) MIME-type for innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Begins a response file.
trans-unit.target: Starter en svarfil.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: The page adapter must call this method before rendering the page, but after calling the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.BeginResponse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Siden-adapteren må kalle denne metoden før gjengis siden, men etter kall av <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.BeginResponse%2A>metode.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.BeginResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: An exception is raised if the BeginFile method is called more than once.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstår et unntak hvis metoden BeginFile kalles mer enn én gang.

trans-unit.source: The unique URL for the file.
trans-unit.target: Unik URL-adressen for filen.

trans-unit.source: The MIME type of the file.
trans-unit.target: MIME-type for filen.

trans-unit.source: The character set used for the file (usually the same as <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Charset*>).
trans-unit.target: Tegnsettet brukes for filen (vanligvis lik <xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Charset*>).</xref:System.Web.HttpResponse.Charset*>

trans-unit.source: this method is called more than once.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden kalles mer enn én gang.

trans-unit.source: Begins a response.
trans-unit.target: Starter svar.

trans-unit.target: Denne APIen er foreldet.

trans-unit.source: This property is provided for convenience, and is equivalent to calling the browser using an <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>, such as `Page.Request.Browser`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er oppgitt for foretrekker og tilsvarer kaller i nettleseren ved hjelp av en <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>, slik som `Page.Request.Browser`.</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.Mobile.MobileCapabilities"></xref> object for the current requesting device.

trans-unit.source: The EnterLayout and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.ExitLayout%2A> methods allow a device adapter to emit markup, in order to begin and end a block using the formatting from a given style.
trans-unit.target: EnterLayout og <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.ExitLayout%2A>metoder Tillat et enhetskort utdata fra markup for å starte og slutte en blokk med formateringen fra en gitt stil.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.ExitLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style reference.
trans-unit.target: Stilreferanse.

trans-unit.source: Begins a block by using the layout and character formatting from a given style.
trans-unit.target: Starter en blokk ved hjelp av oppsett og tegn formatering fra en gitt stil.

trans-unit.source: If `breakAfter` is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, a break is added after the closing style element.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `breakAfter` er <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, en pause legges når lukkingen style-element.

trans-unit.source: The first form of the method assumes `breakAfter` to be <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den første for metoden antas `breakAfter` skal <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.EnterLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.ExitLayout%2A> methods allow a device adapter to emit markup, in order to begin and end a block by using the formatting from a given style.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.EnterLayout%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.ExitLayout%2A>metoder Tillat et enhetskort utdata fra markup for å starte og slutte en blokk ved hjelp av formatering fra en gitt stil.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.ExitLayout%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.EnterLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.EnterLayout%2A> and ExitLayout methods allow a device adapter to emit markup, in order to begin and end a block by using the formatting from a given style.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.EnterLayout%2A>og ExitLayout metoder Tillat et enhetskort utdata fra markup for å starte og slutte en blokk ved hjelp av formatering fra en gitt stil.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Adapters.MobileTextWriter.EnterLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: The style reference.
trans-unit.target: Stilreferanse.

trans-unit.source: If `breakAfter` is true, a break is added after the closing style element.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `breakAfter` er true, en pause legges når lukkingen style-element.

trans-unit.source: The first form of the method assumes `breakAfter` to be <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den første for metoden antas `breakAfter` skal <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This overload of ExitStyle adds a break after the closing style element.
trans-unit.target: Denne overbelastning av ExitStyle legger til en pause etter lukkingen style-element.

trans-unit.source: The style reference.
trans-unit.target: Stilreferanse.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether multipart writing is supported.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om multipart skriving støttes.

trans-unit.source: Default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if multipart writing is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis multipart skriving støttes. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
